Why Visit The Great Wall?

The Great Wall of China is one of the greatest wonders of the world, stretching over 13,000 miles. A symbol of China’s historical strength and architectural brilliance, it offers breathtaking views, thrilling hikes, and a rich cultural experience.

Best Time to Visit

Spring & Autumn (March-May, September-November)

Average Rating

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Location

China, spanning multiple provinces

Your Great Wall Travel Plan

Day 1: Beijing & Badaling Section

Explore Beijing’s historic sites before heading to the famous Badaling section for stunning views.

Day 2: Mutianyu & Cable Car Ride

Visit the scenic Mutianyu section, take a cable car ride, and experience the toboggan slide down.

Day 3: Jinshanling Hike

Embark on a breathtaking hike along the Jinshanling section, perfect for photography.

Day 4: Simatai Night Tour

Enjoy a unique night tour at Simatai, where the Wall is beautifully illuminated.
